local_intent: Probe the lid rim slowly until force contact is detected to verify alignment before grasp.
assumptions: Gripper is unobstructed and able to approach the lid edge
Target green_bin remains visible during approach
coherence_with_global: Implements the verify micro-goal by approaching/aligning to the green_bin_lid, performing a slow low-depth probe (LowerUntilContact), and explicitly verifying contact before subsequent grasp and open steps, consistent with the GLOBAL_BT sequence.
